Row.Text: Carthaginian Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Cothon and Dockyard in the same District. Increases the number of [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2.
Increases the number of [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_RESOURCE] Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2.

+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for Coast, Navigable Rivers, and Wonders. Carthaginian Unique Production Building. Ageless. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
Carthaginian Unique Production Building. Ageless. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for Resources, Districts, and Wonders. Carthaginian Unique Gold Building. Ageless. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
Carthaginian Unique Gold Building. Ageless. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on Coast.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Trade Routes cannot be plundered. All tiles in this City that are adjacent to Coast and eligible for Walls receive a Wall. Must be placed adjacent to a Coast tile.
Trade Routes cannot be plundered. All tiles in this City that are adjacent to Coast and eligible for Walls receive a Wall. Must be placed adjacent to a Coast tile.
There are to be seen at this day certain ruins of the city walls.
